titles.title: Elder Cottage Housing Opportunity Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide assistance for the purchase and installation of elder cottage housing opportunity units.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/21/1987--Introduced. Elder Cottage Housing Opportunity Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1959, the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1968, and the National Housing Act to provide assistance for the purchase and installation of elder cottage housing opportunity units.
